verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> be the words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> on this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> in the plain <S%H6160><s%> over against <S%H4136><s%> the Red <S%H5489><s%> sea, between <S%H996><s%> Paran, <S%H6290><s%> and Tophel, <S%H8603><s%> and Laban, <S%H3837><s%> and Hazeroth, <S%H2698><s%> and Dizahab. <S%H1774><s%>

(There are eleven <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> journey from Horeb <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2722><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Kadesh-barnea.) <S%H6947><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> in the fortieth <S%H705><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the eleventh <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> according unto all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had given him in commandment <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them;

After <S%H310><s%> he had slain <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> which <S%H834><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> which <S%H834><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Astaroth <S%H6252><s%> in Edrei: <S%H154><s%>

On this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> began <S%H2974><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to declare <S%H874><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> law, <S%H8451><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> us in Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Ye have dwelt <S%H3427><s%> long enough <S%H7227><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> mount: <S%H2022><s%>

Turn <S%H6437><s%> you, and take your journey, <S%H5265><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> to the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the places nigh <S%H7934><s%> thereunto, in the plain, <S%H6160><s%> in the hills, <S%H2022><s%> and in the vale, <S%H8219><s%> and in the south, <S%H5045><s%> and by the sea <S%H3220><s%> side, <S%H2348><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and unto Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> river, <S%H5104><s%> the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates. <S%H6578><s%>

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: go in <S%H935><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers, <S%H1><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto them and to their seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them.

And I spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you at that <S%H1931><s%> time, <S%H6256><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I am not able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> you myself alone: <S%H905><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath multiplied <S%H7235><s%> you, and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> ye are this day <S%H3117><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> for multitude. <S%H7230><s%>

(The LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> make you a thousand <S%H505><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> so many more <S%H3254><s%> as ye are, and bless <S%H1288><s%> you, as <S%H834><s%> he hath promised <S%H1696><s%> you!)
How <S%H349><s%> can I myself alone <S%H905><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> your encumbrance, <S%H2960><s%> and your burden, <S%H4853><s%> and your strife? <S%H7379><s%>

Take <S%H3051><s%> you wise <S%H2450><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> and understanding, <S%H995><s%> and known <S%H3045><s%> among your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> and I will make <S%H7760><s%> them rulers <S%H7218><s%> over you.
And ye answered <S%H6030><s%> me, and said, <S%H559><s%> The thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> for us to do. <S%H6213><s%>

So I took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> of your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> wise <S%H2450><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> and known, <S%H3045><s%> and made <S%H5414><s%> them heads <S%H7218><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you, captains <S%H8269><s%> over thousands, <S%H505><s%> and captains <S%H8269><s%> over hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> and captains <S%H8269><s%> over fifties, <S%H2572><s%> and captains <S%H8269><s%> over tens, <S%H6235><s%> and officers <S%H7860><s%> among your tribes. <S%H7626><s%>

And I charged <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> your judges <S%H8199><s%> at that <S%H1931><s%> time, <S%H6256><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> the causes between <S%H996><s%> your brethren, <S%H251><s%> and judge <S%H8199><s%> righteously <S%H6664><s%> between <S%H996><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> and his brother, <S%H251><s%> and the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is with him.

Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> respect <S%H5234><s%> persons <S%H6440><s%> in judgment; <S%H4941><s%> but ye shall hear <S%H8085><s%> the small <S%H6996><s%> as well as the great; <S%H1419><s%> ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> be afraid <S%H1481><s%> of the face <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of man; <S%H376><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> is God's: <S%H430><s%> and the cause <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is too hard <S%H7185><s%> for <S%H4480><s%> you, bring <S%H7126><s%> it unto <S%H413><s%> me, and I will hear <S%H8085><s%> it.
And I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you at that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the things <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye should do. <S%H6213><s%>

And when we departed <S%H5265><s%> from Horeb, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2722><s%> we went through <S%H1980><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye saw <S%H7200><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us; and we came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> Kadesh-barnea. <S%H6947><s%>

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, Ye are come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> doth give <S%H5414><s%> unto us.

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee: go up <S%H5927><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> it, as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%> hath said <S%H1696><s%> unto thee; fear <S%H3372><s%> not, <S%H408><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> be discouraged. <S%H2865><s%>

And ye came near <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me every one <S%H3605><s%> of you, and said, <S%H559><s%> We will send <S%H7971><s%> men <S%H376><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us, and they shall search us out <S%H2658><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and bring <S%H7725><s%> us word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H853><s%> by what <S%H834><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> we must go up, <S%H5927><s%> and <S%H853><s%> into <S%H413><s%> what <S%H834><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> we shall come. <S%H935><s%>

And the saying <S%H1697><s%> pleased me well: <S%H3190><s%> <S%H5869><s%> and I took <S%H3947><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> you, one <S%H259><s%> of a tribe: <S%H7626><s%>

And they turned <S%H6437><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> into the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol, <S%H812><s%> and searched it out. <S%H7270><s%> <S%H853><s%>

And they took <S%H3947><s%> of the fruit <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6529><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> in their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and brought it down <S%H3381><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> us, and brought <S%H7725><s%> us word <S%H1697><s%> again, and said, <S%H559><s%> It is a good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> doth give <S%H5414><s%> us.

Notwithstanding ye would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> go up, <S%H5927><s%> but rebelled against <S%H4784><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%>

And ye murmured <S%H7279><s%> in your tents, <S%H168><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hated <S%H8135><s%> us, he hath brought us forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to deliver <S%H5414><s%> us into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> us.

Whither <S%H575><s%> shall we <S%H587><s%> go up? <S%H5927><s%> our brethren <S%H251><s%> have discouraged <S%H4549><s%> <S%H853><s%> our heart, <S%H3824><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The people <S%H5971><s%> is greater <S%H1419><s%> and taller <S%H7311><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> we; the cities <S%H5892><s%> are great <S%H1419><s%> and walled <S%H1219><s%> up to heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and moreover <S%H1571><s%> we have seen <S%H7200><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Anakims <S%H6062><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>
Then I said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, Dread <S%H6206><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> them.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> which goeth <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, he <S%H1931><s%> shall fight <S%H3898><s%> for you, according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he did <S%H6213><s%> for <S%H854><s%> you in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> before your eyes; <S%H5869><s%>

And in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> where <S%H834><s%> thou hast seen <S%H7200><s%> how that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> bore <S%H5375><s%> thee, as <S%H834><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> doth bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye went, <S%H1980><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> ye came <S%H935><s%> into <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>
Yet in this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> ye did not <S%H369><s%> believe <S%H539><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%>

Who went <S%H1980><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, to search you out <S%H8446><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> to pitch your tents <S%H2583><s%> in, in fire <S%H784><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> to show <S%H7200><s%> you by what <S%H834><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> ye should go, <S%H1980><s%> and in a cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day. <S%H3119><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your words, <S%H1697><s%> and was wroth, <S%H7107><s%> and swore, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Surely <S%H518><s%> there shall not one <S%H376><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> that good <S%H2896><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto your fathers, <S%H1><s%>

Save <S%H2108><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh; <S%H3312><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it, and to him will I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he hath trodden <S%H1869><s%> upon, and to his children, <S%H1121><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> he hath wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> with me for your sakes, <S%H1558><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> shalt not <S%H3808><s%> go in <S%H935><s%> thither. <S%H8033><s%>

But Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> which standeth <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee, he <S%H1931><s%> shall go in <S%H935><s%> thither: <S%H8033><s%> encourage <S%H2388><s%> him: for <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall cause <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> to inherit <S%H5157><s%> it.

Moreover your little ones, <S%H2945><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye said <S%H559><s%> should be <S%H1961><s%> a prey, <S%H957><s%> and your children, <S%H1121><s%> which <S%H834><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> had no knowledge <S%H3045><s%> <S%H3808><s%> between good <S%H2896><s%> and evil, <S%H7451><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> shall go in <S%H935><s%> thither, <S%H8033><s%> and unto them will I give <S%H5414><s%> it, and they <S%H1992><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it.
But as for you, <S%H859><s%> turn <S%H6437><s%> you, and take your journey <S%H5265><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea. <S%H3220><s%>

Then ye answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, We have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> we <S%H587><s%> will go up <S%H5927><s%> and fight, <S%H3898><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> us. And when ye had girded on <S%H2296><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> <S%H853><s%> his weapons <S%H3627><s%> of war, <S%H4421><s%> ye were ready <S%H1951><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> into the hill. <S%H2022><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Say <S%H559><s%> unto them, Go not up, <S%H5927><s%> <S%H3808><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> fight; <S%H3898><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I am not <S%H369><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you; lest <S%H3808><s%> ye be smitten <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies. <S%H341><s%>

So I spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you; and ye would not <S%H3808><s%> hear, <S%H8085><s%> but rebelled against <S%H4784><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and went presumptuously up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H2102><s%> into the hill. <S%H2022><s%>

And the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> you, and chased <S%H7291><s%> you, as <S%H834><s%> bees <S%H1682><s%> do, <S%H6213><s%> and destroyed <S%H3807><s%> you in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> Hormah. <S%H2767><s%>

And ye returned <S%H7725><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> would not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> to your voice, <S%H6963><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> give ear <S%H238><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you.
So ye abode <S%H3427><s%> in Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> according unto the days <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye abode <S%H3427><s%> there.
